intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects to power on the Samsung Frame TV and switch it to Channel 5 for viewing.  
Constraints & cues: The command is directed specifically at the Samsung Frame TV, with no prior preferences or history affecting the request.  
Risk assessment: There is a risk of ambiguity regarding whether Channel 5 is available on the current input source (HDMI4) or if it requires switching to a different input source (e.g., digital TV).
